entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who might have told the Death Eaters the address of the headquarters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group that Snape might have informed about the address.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is mentioned as a person who set up curses against Snape to protect the headquarters.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as a person that Harry asked about Mad-Eye.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as a person who was sitting beside Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is mentioned throughout the passage.

relationships.description: Snape might have informed the Death Eaters about the address.
Mad-Eye set up curses against Snape to protect the headquarters.
The curses set up by Mad-Eye would bind Snape's tongue if he tries to talk about the place.
